ingredients.ingredient: 1 pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into 6 wedges

cookingTips: Mix cinnamon and sugar together before applying to pineapple
Grill over medium heat until caramelized, about 4-5 minutes per side
Allow caramelization to develop natural sweetness of the fruit
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does grilling transform fresh pineapple into a caramelized dessert?
